desc:
Please replace the current API connection in the current ABSA E2E asmx service with the v2 API. We can do this without them even noticing.... They are currently running on v1.

Please create an asmx webservice with the below 2 methods in that accepts the same request / response as the current v1 api.

â€¢         Login
â€¢         DataSearchConsumerTraceIDNumberVerified

This service must be deployed to uat and live to run alongside the Searchworks v2 API (api.searchworks.co.za)

Please create a Technical Specification Document that explains these methods and lists the Live and UAT urlâ€™s of the new service?
name: SW - ABSA asmx API
